full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,RTA GA-YAN 'GUGS CHOG ZHES BYA BA ZHUGS OS, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @007A *, ,(BYAMS PA'I SEMS KUN NAS BLANG RE THA SHAL SBYON PA'I SPYOD YUL NA SU TI KARMA MING CAN GYIS, SLOB DPON CHEN PO PADMA 'BYUNG GNAS KYIS GA-YANG KHUG CES RTA GA-YANG 'GUG CHOG 'DI NI YUL RNAMS RTA'I GA-YANG SHING TU NYAMS NAS NYAM BZHAG PA LA, ,@007B SOGS LA GZHI BYAS NAS 'PHRAL DU BRIS SO, ,'DI LA NOR 'KHRUL 'BYUNG BA MKHAS PA RNAMS LA 'CHAGS SO, ,BDAG MA SGRIB PA MI 'BYUNG BAR MDZAD DU GSOL, ,LEGS CHA CUNG CAD YOD NA, DGE BA'I 'GRO KUN DBUL BA'I SDUG BSNGAL DANG BRAL NAS MYUR DU DGA' BA'I ZHING KHAMS SU SKYES PA'I RGYUR GYUR CIG , ,,BKRA SHIS, DGE'O, ,MANGGA LAm, ,)
author_simple: SLOB DPON CHEN PO PADMA 'BYUNG GNAS,
